question: Where is the Headquarters of International Crops Research Institute of Semi-Arid Tropics (ICRISAT) located?
explanation:
The International Crops Research Institute of Semi-Arid Tropics (ICRISAT) headquartered at Hyderabad, Telangana. It was founded in 1972 by a group of international organisations.
Recently, the Ministry of Civil Aviation has permitted the ICRISAT to use Drones for agricultural research activities. It was founded in 1972 by a consortium of organisations convened.
